overview.title: Dashboard
overview.subtitle: Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your profile.
overview.connectStripeHint: Connect Stripe to see your sales analytics

steps.welcome: Welcome to the Overview! Here’s a quick summary of your performance.
steps.stats: These cards show views, clicks, and average CTR.
steps.sales: Track sales, revenue, and daily trends in this panel.
steps.activity: Recent activity and quick filters to analyze events.
steps.sidebar: This is your main dashboard menu for navigation.
steps.navEditor: Open the editor to customize your page.
steps.navForms: Create forms and capture leads here.
steps.navProducts: Manage products and sales in this section.
steps.navIntegrations: Connect integrations like Stripe and other apps.
steps.navSettings: Access your account settings and preferences.

steps.intro: This is your editor. Control the entire page structure here.
steps.palette: Drag a block from the list to build your page (drag & drop).
steps.canvas: Drop blocks here and reorder them by dragging the handle.
steps.block: Click a card to edit content and adjust styles like color and font.
steps.settingsTab: Open Settings to adjust global styles (fonts, background, cards).
steps.typography: Change the site font or upload a custom font.
steps.cardStyle: Set card color, opacity, and effects to match your brand.
steps.preview: Live preview of the final result. Your edits appear here.
steps.mobilePreview: Use mobile preview to see how it looks on phones.

steps.header: Manage your leads and quick actions here.
steps.toggle: Enable or pause lead capture with this toggle.
steps.export: Export all leads to CSV with one click.
steps.stats: Quick metrics: total, new today, and conversion rate.
steps.search: Search by email and filter results.
steps.table: Full leads list with actions to email or remove.
steps.bulk: Select multiple leads to send, export, or delete in bulk.

steps.header: Manage your products and catalog status here.
steps.add: Click here to add a new product.
steps.fee: This banner shows your store fee and an upgrade shortcut.
steps.search: Search products and filter by status.
steps.card: This is a product card. Edit or remove from the actions.
steps.addPlaceholder: Use this shortcut to create another product quickly.

steps.header: Manage your portfolio and showcase projects here.
steps.add: Add a new project to your portfolio.
steps.grid: Your portfolio projects are listed here.
steps.card: This is a project card. Edit or delete using the actions.
steps.addPlaceholder: Use this shortcut to create another project quickly.

steps.newPost: Create a new post with this button.
steps.toolbar: Search and filter your posts here.
steps.table: Your posts list is displayed here.
steps.row: This is a post row. Use actions to edit or delete.

steps.header: Manage and share your QR codes here.
steps.create: Create a new QR code by adding a destination URL.
steps.list: Your saved QR codes appear here. Select one to preview.
steps.preview: Preview the selected QR code and copy its link.
steps.appearance: Customize colors and appearance of the QR code.
steps.download: Download the QR code as PNG.

steps.header: This is your automation builder. Name your workflow and manage its status here.
steps.canvas: Build your flow on this canvas. Connect steps to define the journey.
steps.palette: Drag a trigger or action from this toolbar into the canvas.
steps.node: Click a node to configure its details and behavior.
steps.actions: Save drafts or activate your automation when you're ready.

steps.header: Manage marketing slots and proposals here.
steps.create: Create a new advertising slot for your page.
steps.stripe: Connect Stripe to receive payouts from advertisers.
steps.grid: Your marketing slots are listed here.
steps.card: This is a slot card with status and pricing.
steps.proposals: View proposals and manage applications here.

steps.status: Pause or resume bookings from this control.
steps.tabs: Switch between Today, Bookings, and Availability.
steps.filters: Filter bookings by status or date.

steps.card: This is a template card. Edit or delete it from here.

steps.usage: Track your email usage for automations.

dns.title: DNS Configuration Required
dns.body: To make your domain work, you need to add a DNS record to your domain provider (like GoDaddy, Namecheap, or Cloudflare).
dns.note: Note: DNS changes can take up to 48 hours to propagate globally, though it usually happens within a few minutes.

status.title: Domain Linked
status.body: Your bio is configured to use {{domain}}. If you've set up your DNS correctly, your page should be accessible soon.

items.mailchimp: Collect emails and grow your newsletter audience.
items.googleAnalytics: Track visitors and gain deeper insights into your traffic.

aboutPage.subtitle: We're on a mission to give every creator and entrepreneur the tools they need to turn their passion into a thriving business.

story.p1: Portyo was born from a simple observation: creators were spending too much time juggling multiple tools, instead of doing what they do best — creating.
story.p2: We built an all-in-one platform that consolidates everything you need: a beautiful link-in-bio, powerful analytics, email collection, scheduling, and e-commerce.
story.p3: Today, thousands of creators trust Portyo to power their online presence. And we're just getting started.

creatorFirst.title: Creator-First
creatorFirst.body: Everything we build starts with you in mind. Your success is our success.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.body: Pushing boundaries to bring you cutting-edge tools that make a difference.

community.title: Community
community.body: We believe in the power of connection and building genuine relationships.

growth.title: Growth
growth.body: Committed to helping you grow your audience and revenue sustainably.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.body: By accessing or using Portyo ("the Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the Service.

accounts.title: 2. Accounts and Memberships
accounts.body: If you create an account on the Service, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and you are fully responsible for all activities that occur under the account. You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized uses of your account or any other breaches of security.

userContent.title: 3. User Content
userContent.body: We do not own any data, information, or material that you submit to the Service. You shall have sole responsibility for the accuracy, quality, integrity, legality, reliability, appropriateness, and intellectual property ownership or right to use of all submitted Content. We reserve the right to refuse or remove any Content in our sole discretion.

billing.title: 4. Billing and Payments
billing.body: We use Stripe for payment processing. By selecting a paid plan, you agree to pay the subscription fees indicated for that service. Payments will be charged on a pre-pay basis on the day you sign up for an Upgrade and will cover the use of that service for a monthly or annual subscription period as indicated.

termination.title: 5. Termination
termination.body: We may terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
changes.body: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.bodyPrefix: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.body: Welcome to Portyo ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.intro: We collect information that you strictly provide to us when you register for an account, specifically:

personal.label: Personal Data:
personal.body: Name, email address, and profile information you choose to display on your bio page.

payment.label: Payment Data:
payment.body: Financial information is processed directly by our payment processor, Stripe. We do not store full credit card numbers on our servers.

usage.label: Usage Data:
usage.body: Information about how you interact with our services, such as page views and button clicks, to improve our product.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the information we collect to:

items.provide: Provide, operate, and maintain our website.
items.process: Process your transactions and manage your subscription.
items.improve: Improve, personalize, and expand our website.
items.communicate: Communicate with you regarding updates, security alerts, and support.

sharing.title: 4. Sharing Your Information
sharing.body: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with third-party service providers (such as Stripe for payments or Google Analytics for usage tracking) strictly for the purpose of operating our business and providing our services to you.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.body: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. However, please remember that no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.body: Depending on your location, you may have rights regarding your personal data, including the right to access, correct, or delete the personal information we hold about you. You can manage your account settings directly within the Portyo dashboard.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.bodyPrefix: If you have questions or comments about this policy, you may contact us at:

footer.tagline: Turn your bio into your business. The all-in-one platform for creators to grow, monetize, and own their audience.

editor.cardOpacity: Controls how transparent the card background is. 0% = fully transparent, 100% = fully solid.
editor.cardBlur: Blur intensity for the frosted glass effect. Higher values create a stronger blur behind the card.
editor.customFont: Upload a .ttf or .woff2 font file to use your own brand typography.
editor.backgroundPatterns: Choose a decorative pattern for your page background. Each pattern adapts to your selected colors.

marketing.acceptOtherPrices: When enabled, advertisers can propose prices outside your min-max range. You can still reject any proposal.
marketing.priceRange: Set your minimum and maximum acceptable prices. This helps advertisers know your expectations.
marketing.platformFee: Portyo charges a 5% fee on all accepted proposals. This covers payment processing and platform maintenance.

analytics.googleAnalyticsId: Find your GA ID in Google Analytics → Admin → Data Streams → Your stream → Measurement ID (starts with G-).
analytics.facebookPixelId: Find your Pixel ID in Meta Events Manager → Data Sources → Your Pixel → Settings.
analytics.noIndex: When enabled, search engines like Google won't show your page in search results. Good for private pages.

seo.whatIsSeo: SEO helps your page appear in Google searches. Better SEO = more people finding you organically.
seo.metaTitle: The title shown in search results and browser tabs. Keep it under 60 characters for best results.
seo.metaDescription: A brief summary shown below your title in search results. Aim for 120-160 characters.
seo.ogImage: The image shown when your link is shared on social media. Recommended size: 1200x630 pixels.
seo.keywords: Words that help search engines understand your page content. Separate with commas.

products.digitalProduct: Digital products are delivered instantly via download link. Physical products require shipping.
products.stockQuantity: Leave empty for unlimited stock. Set a number to limit available units.

scheduler.availability: Define your working hours for each day. Clients can only book during these times.
scheduler.blockedDates: Block specific dates when you're unavailable (holidays, vacations, etc.).
scheduler.bufferTime: Time between appointments for breaks or preparation.

integrations.upgradeRequired: This integration requires a paid plan. Upgrade to unlock.
integrations.comingSoon: We're working on this integration. It will be available in a future update.
